swal.text3: You will not be able to recover this client!. Before delete, make sure that you have remove client from teams, projects, tasks, defects and incidents etc..
swal.text4: You will not be able to recover this project!. Before delete, make sure that you have deleted all tasks, defects and incidents related to this project.
